adDetails: I'm a personal Trainer/Strength & Conditioning Coach with over 13 years of experience including, competing in professional sports. I enjoy training all levels of fitness with a wide range of "result based" methods. I've expanded my knowledge and stay up-to-date with the latest science on biomechanics and physiology. While not forgetting the fact that "old school" tried and true work outs blended with the most current research is the best way to achieve your personal fitness goals; whether its fitness, weight loss, sports specific conditioning, core strength and stability and improving flexibility, agility, plyometrics, metabolic and much more. I'm looking forward to meeting new clients and helping you reach your goals. The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential. . ..these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence. My program is 100% guaranteed to work if you work!
